    • Method Detail

      • clickOnConnect

        void clickOnConnect​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        By clicking on "Connect" button initialize connecting to Database and then to server. If Database could not connect properly server would not be started.

      • getConnectionFieldsAndConnect

        private boolean getConnectionFieldsAndConnect()
        The parameters that given by the user, it will set the conncetion the database. If the parameters are illegal, it will return false and will not connect to the database.
        Returns:
        true or false, based on the parameters that given by the user.

      • clickOnDisconnect

        void clickOnDisconnect​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        When the user will click on the disconnect button, it will close the server, the database connection and will close all the users that connected to the client.

      • closeServerWindow

        public void closeServerWindow()
        will close the applications and the running threads.

      • disconnectServerAndDB

        private void disconnectServerAndDB()
        The function disconnects from the OCSF Server and from the database.

      • checkParameters

        private boolean checkParameters()
        Checking the parameters that been given by the user. (Depending if the user inserted the right information).
        Returns:
        true or false

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        by using the initialize function, it will initial the table and the context of the table
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • importUsersToZliAction

        void importUsersToZliAction​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        If the users clicked on the import button when he connected to the externalDB, it will save the users into list to insert them into zli DB.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent -

      • get

        public static ServerFormController get()
        Refresh clients table after client connection/disconnection

      • refreshClientsTable

        public void refreshClientsTable()
        If client connected to the server, it will refersh the table for the new clients that connected.

      • generateReports

        void generateReports​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        If the user clicked on generateReport, it will generate the reports if it's the end of the month.
        Parameters:
        ActionEvent -
